properties.Observatio: Located on Hanthana reserve. A dam is built across a flowing water stream to collect water(L=2.0m, H=0.3m, Thickness=0.1m). A formal water scheme has been established. The boundaries are not marked.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid/Fabricating & fixing securi

properties.Observatio: This is a This is a canal though which spring water flows. The water is distributed by building a dam (L=4.5m, H=0.75m) across the canal and sending it to the stock tanks trough a 100mm pipe.
properties.Descriptio: Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop/Contingancies 10%

properties.Name of Sp: No. 02 water source of C.G division

properties.Name of Sp: No. 08 water source of C.G division
properties.Observatio: Located on CG Division forest Reserve. Water from the canal leading from the water springs is collected in a catchpit and distributed. The catchpit is made of stones and soil. There is no stock tank and filtering system.

properties.Name of Sp: No. 06 water source of C.G division
properties.Observatio: Located on CG Division estate. Water from water springs and a canal leading from the water springs is collected in a catchpit and distributed trough a stock tank. The catchpit has no cover and the boundaries are not marked.

properties.Descriptio: Establishing a water filtering system/Contingancies 10%
